EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello {{lead.First Name}},
Enclosed is your requested download of the case study: Sweden’s transport operator builds a nationwide GSM-R & IP/ MPLS communications network to enhance safety and efficiency. DOWNLOAD THE CASE STUDY <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200917]]> Want to learn more about how Nokia’s solutions for railways can help you travel at the speed of life? Please visit:
- Nokia Railways home <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/railways/travel-at-the-speed-of-life]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
